Comment: 1. Trump uses dehumanizing rhetoric like "animals" and "vermin" and "they're poisoning our blood." He says he didn't know Hitler used that same rhetoric first, so give him credit for coming up with it on his own, as if *thinking along the same lines as Hitler* is better than quoting Hitler.   2. Trump tells straight-up lies, saying they're "eating the pets" and exaggerating crime statistics. Conservative media doesn't fact check any of it.  2. Conservative media frames everything in terms of "they're criminals" never mentioning that illegal border crossing is a minor misdemeanor with the same penalty as mountain biking on a federal trail, or that if they entered as a tourist it's not even a crime, or that if they've applied for asylum then entering the country illegally is waived.   And all of this serves to train the magas to be okay with, or even to celebrate, abject cruelty toward the targets of that rhetoric. It trains them to be okay with the targets of that rhetoric being due process. It trains them to be okay with the targets of that rhetoric being denied basic human rights.    It's one thing to read about how things developed at other times in other countries that parallel all of the above, and quite another to be watching it happen from the inside, to my own country.
Author: KingKrasnov
